snippet: An art installation, billed as the world’s largest L.E.D. sculpture, is set to illuminate the San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge, the Golden Gate’s long-overshadowed rival.
abstract: Art installation by artist Leo Villareal, billed as world’s largest LED sculpture, is set to illuminate San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge, Golden Gate’s long-overshadowed rival.
lead_paragraph: An art installation, billed as the world’s largest L.E.D. sculpture, is set to illuminate the San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge, the Golden Gate’s long-overshadowed rival.

headline.seo: Long-Overshadowed Bay Bridge Will Go From Drab Gray to Glowing
headline.main: Long Stuck in Obscurity, Bay Bridge Will Go From Drab Gray to Glowing
headline.print_headline: Long-Overshadowed Bay Bridge Will Go From Drab Gray to Glowing
